Method Detail

makeHeader

private static java.lang.String makeHeader(java.lang.String title)
creates the full html header with a given title

convertTime

private static java.lang.String convertTime(int time)
Takes an int (from 0 - 1440) representing minutes from the beginning till end of one day. Converts that into a String in 24h time format hh:mm

createItinary

public static java.lang.String createItinary(Journey[] trip)
Takes an array of Journeys (it interprets each array element as a part of 1 big journey with stops where you change trains) and turns them into a nice HTML file which it then returns as a String. This could then be displayed, saved or printed.

createStationPlan

public static java.lang.String createStationPlan(Journey[] trains,
                                                 boolean list)
Method to output details from a StationManager query as pretty html. Give it a list of journeys which all begin with the station which we are interested in and are in chronological order. Can be used to create listing for entire day (set list = true) or just for the details of one train (list = false).

createStationPlan

public static java.lang.String createStationPlan(Journey[] trains)
Convenience method overloads the real createStationPlan() and makes it always produce lists.
